page.title: 13Law and order
page.content: There are police stations in Swinton Mexborough and Wath which deal with all of the day to day events of the community. The crime rate in the area is quite high for a small community. There is a large amount of hooliganism and vandalism and the main problem is the shopping areas appears to be shoplifting. Recently a problem has developed with glue-sniffing and drug abuse which the police are working hard to solve. Police and community relations have recently been strained after the miners strike, but it is hoped that these problems will soon be solved.
